In England, in the seven days to 28 May, there were 17,366 new confirmed cases (30.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 May, there were 13,022 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 33% (4,344 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 June is 3,921,939 (6,967.8 cases per 100,000 population).
